title: [FSX] - France VFR - Auvergne Photo HD [RIP] (2012)
description:
[FSX] - FRANCEVFR - AUVERGNE PHOTO HD [RIP] (2012)

The PHOTO Regional product range provides a high resolution photoreal and terrain mesh coverage for each French region and island. This photoreal texture coverage replaces the standard Microsoft Flight Simulator X default scenery with a real lanscape. You can then add local sceneries onto this photoreal texture based for more realism.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ All lakes and rivers have been entirely cut out and faithfully represented, reworked with bodies of landable water.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Water transparency effects for the whole scenery coverage.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Optional Waterclass and original water texture provided (depending on regions).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Extremely precise geo-referenced texture positionning is carried out in order to ensure a maximal compatibility with scenery add-ons for this region.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Process development is fully conform to the Microsoft Flight Simulator X SDK, ensuring a maximal compatibility with future versions of Flight Simulator.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Open scenery concept allows an easy integration of scenery add-ons from other editors.
